name: Smite Spec
desc:
Further enhances the ability to use Wild Bloom.
Wild Bloom, Regen Pulse, and Nature Ward applies Symbiotic Mark to allies.
Symbiotic Mark: Lasts for 10s, all DMG dealt heals the Symbiotic Mark target for 45% of the DMG.

Healing of Stillness: If you don't deal DMG to enemies for 5s, each hit of your Basic Attack restores HP to up to 10 allies, prioritizing Allies. All four hits restore a total of 12.6% of your Max HP.

name: Forest Attack
desc: Forest Attack + 5

name: Stamina
desc: Stamina + 30

name: Nature Shield
desc:
When Wild Bloom heals a target, it also applies Nature Shield to them.
Targets with Nature Shield restore HP when hit, with the amount equal to 10% of your ATK. This effect can occur up to once per second.

name: Pulse Duality
desc: When Regen Pulse is actively used, it spreads twice.

name: Stamina
desc: Stamina + 30

name: Stamina
desc: Stamina + 30

name: Intellect
desc: Intellect + 10

name: Thorns
desc:
When Wild Seed hits a target, it inflicts Thorn on them.
Verdant DMG dealt by players to targets with Thorn +5%.

name: Forest Attack
desc: Forest Attack + 5

name: Intellect
desc: Intellect + 10

name: Shelter
desc: Within 5s after Casting Infusion, the damage absorption of the Nature Shield added by Wild Bloom or Nature Ward is doubled.

name: Luck Damage
desc:
Lucky Hit DMG Multiplier +5%.
Every 1% Luck grants 1% Lucky Hit DMG Multiplier.

name: Intellect
desc: Intellect + 10

name: Wild Blessing
desc:
Wild Bloom now stores up to 2 overdrives.
Wild Bloom's Energy cost -15%.

name: Stamina
desc: Stamina + 30

name: Final Bloomwheel
desc: When Wild bloom triggers a Lucky Hit, it reduces the CD of Infusion by 3s.

name: Bloomheal
desc: Replace Ultimate, Divine Circle Bloom with Bloomheal.

name: Intellect
desc: Intellect + 10

name: Stamina
desc: Stamina + 30

name: Wide-area Thorns
desc: Successful hit of Feral Seed on the targets with Thorn spreads Thorn to other units within 10 meters.

name: Stamina
desc: Stamina + 30

name: Stamina
desc: Stamina + 30

name: Pulse Retrospect
desc:
Regen Pulse returns to your position after it reaches the max distance.
Regen Pulse now deals DMG to enemies.

name: Bud Acquisition
desc: When an enemy within 10 meters that you are engaged with (effective within a team) is defeated, generates an Engram Orb, which grants 1 Regen Bud upon pickup.

name: Forest Attack
desc: Forest Attack + 5

name: Feral Seed Symbiosis
desc: When the number of active Symbiotic Marks is greater than or equal to 5, the damage of Feral Seeds +100%.

name: Intellect
desc: Intellect + 10

name: Pulse Echo
desc:
When dealing DMG, Infusion grants 1 stack of Pulse Echo.
Pulse Echo: Increases DMG dealt of Regen Pulse by 20%, which lasts 12s and stacks up to 5 times.

name: Breath of Symbiosis
desc: Symbiotic Mark enhances Healingiveness by 2%. Each 5% Mastery enhances Healingiveness by 1%.

name: Laceration
desc:
When dealing DMG, Infusion inflicts Laceration on the target.
Laceration: Takes 100% more DMG from Thorn in 2s.

name: Stamina
desc: Stamina + 30

name: Stamina
desc: Stamina + 30

name: Stag Charge
desc:
After triggering a total of 10 Nourishing Seeds or Wild Seeds, Wild Bloom evolves into Stag Charge.
Casting Stag Charge instants grants 3 Regen Buds.

name: Intellect
desc: Intellect + 10

name: Intellect
desc: Intellect + 10

name: Wings of Revival
desc:
When an ally within 20 meters takes DMG exceeding 30% of their HP, Revival triggers, which can affect the same target up to once every 45s.
Revival: Restores HP equal to 50% of the DMG taken over 5s.

name: Stamina
desc: Stamina + 30

name: Arcane of Green
desc: When Feral Seed deals DMG, it increases the DMG dealt by Infusion, Wild Bloom, Stag Charge in the next 10s by 20%.

name: Intellect
desc: Intellect + 10

name: Verdant Blessing
desc:
When HP of an ally with Inspiration drops below 20%, Blessing triggers.
Blessing: Grants a Nature Shield and reduces the DMG taken by 35% for 8s, once every 60s.

name: Forest Attack
desc: Forest Attack + 5

name: Intellect
desc: Intellect + 10

name: Flourish
desc: When Infusion, Feral Seed, or Wild Bloom deals DMG, 30% chance to reduce the CD of the Ultimate by 1s, once per second.

name: Double Infusion
desc: After casting Stag Charge, the number of channels for the next Infusion +100%.

name: Symbiosis Extension
desc: Each Wild Seed fired extends the duration of activated Symbiotic Mark by 1 second.

name: Swift Bud
desc: Each Regen Bud gained, reduces the CD of Feral Seed by 1 second.

desc: Stamina + 30

desc: Stamina + 30

name: Healing Pulse
desc: When an enemy within 10 meters that you are engaged with (effective within a team) is defeated, generates a Healing Pulse. This can only occur once every 10s.

name: Intellect
desc: Intellect + 10

name: Forest Attack
desc: Forest Attack + 5

name: Stamina
desc: Stamina + 30

name: Swift Shelter
desc: Each use or trigger of Regen Pulse, reduces the CD of Nature Ward by 2s.

name: Wild Luck
desc: When Wild Bloom or Regen Pulse deal DMG, grants a chance (equal to the half percentage of Luck) to gain 1 Regen Bud. If the target is affected by Thorn, doubles the chance.

name: Pulse Breath
desc: If equipped with Regen Pulse skill, Nature Ward and Ultimates will trigger Regen Pulse when their CDs are completed.

name: Verdant Impact
desc: For every 20 stacks of Pulse Echo gained, the next actively cast Regen Pulse triggers a Blossom Charge at both the nearest enemy and the Ally with lowest HP.

name: Wild Protection
desc:
The charge count of Nature Ward +1.
The charge time of Nature Ward decreases by 5s.
